name: mernnote
description: MERNnote is a comprehensive full-stack notes application built using the MERN stack (MongoDB, Express.js, React.js, Node.js). This project represents a significant milestone in my journey from frontend-focused React development to full-stack web development, showcasing my evolution as a developer and the integration of multiple cutting-edge technologies.

scripts.build: npm install --prefix backend && npm install --prefix frontend && npm run build --prefix frontend
